attributes.action: Take computers out of leaky and incompetant government departments.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please remove all computers from, and future access to computers by, those incompetent, incontinent, and downright leaky, departments which have allowed personal data into unknown, or known, but unintended, hands.

rejection.details: Please refrain from posting comments in address fields.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
